answers.answer: Hi,Hair loss may be due to a number of things such as stress, hormonal problems, pregnancy, some medications, infections or may be a part of an underlying disease, such as lupus or diabetes. Are there other signs or symptoms present? Not all hair loss is permanent. There are many causes of temporary hair loss that can be treated with diet or stress reduction. It would be best to have this evaluated further by your doctor for proper management.Take care and regards.
